title: High Gender Equality Rating
description: In 2023, Kyrgyzstan achieved a CPIA gender equality rating of 4.5, indicating a strong commitment to gender equality in the region.

title: Widespread Access to Basic Handwashing Facilities in Urban Areas
description: As of 2019, 98.66% of the urban population in Kyrgyzstan had access to basic handwashing facilities, showcasing excellent public health infrastructure.

title: Comprehensive Access to Basic Handwashing Facilities Nationwide
description: In 2019, 98.28% of Kyrgyzstan's population had access to basic handwashing facilities, reflecting a high standard of hygiene across the country.

title: Minimal Bilateral Aid from Luxembourg
description: In 2015, Kyrgyzstan received a net bilateral aid flow of approximately $10,000 from Luxembourg, one of the lowest among DAC donors.
